description: Ginger scallion sauce is one of those go-to sauces you see at every Chinese restaurant.  It's especially popular in the Chinese barbecue shops that serve char siu, roasted duck and chicken -- you know, the ones that hang the meat right at the window for everyone to see.  You can always ask for a side of ginger scallion sauce to take home with your bbq-ed meats.
title: Chinese Ginger Scallion Sauce
